GUI package¶

Submodules¶

GUI.GameGUI module¶

class GUI.GameGUI.GameGUI[source]¶

Bases: tkinter.Tk

This class provides a simple interface for the user to choose a game.

show_frame(cont)[source]¶

This method is used to switch between frames.

Parameters

cont – the name of the frame which should be switched to

class GUI.GameGUI.GameSelector(parent, controller)[source]¶

Bases: tkinter.Frame

This class provides a simple interface for the user to choose a game.

return_game()[source]¶

This method retrieves the selected game when the user presses the button.

set_games(games)[source]¶

This method sets a given list.

Parameters

games – the currently active games

class GUI.GameGUI.GameStartPage(parent, controller)[source]¶

Bases: tkinter.Frame

This class is used to tell it should generate a new Publisher as a new game started.

ACTIVE = False¶
button_click()[source]¶

This method sets the parameter active to true if a game is running according to user input.

get_state()[source]¶

This method returns the current state of the button. If it is pressed, it resets it.

Returns

whether or not the button is pressed

class GUI.GameGUI.InformationDisplay(parent, controller)[source]¶

Bases: tkinter.Frame

This class is used to display the current game event on the Raspberry Pi.

update_information(msg)[source]¶

This method displays the current game event.

Param

msg: the current game event

class GUI.NetworkUI.PasswordPage(parent, controller)[source]¶

Bases: tkinter.Frame

This class is used to let the user input their password.

This method connects to a given network using the given password.

Parameters

ssid – network name

class GUI.NetworkUI.WlanChooser(parent, controller)[source]¶

Bases: tkinter.Frame

This class displays all available networks and lets a user choose his network.

choose_wlan()[source]¶

This method retrieves the selected game when the user presses the button.

GUI.NetworkUI.show_error_box(msg)[source]¶

This function shows a error box with a given message.

Parameters

msg – the message to be displayed

GUI.NetworkUI.show_question_box(msg, obj)[source]¶

This function displays a question box with a given question.

Parameters

  • obj – wrapper for switching between frames

  • msg – the message thats to be displayed
